EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2019-03-21
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Greenplum & Pivotal Postgres
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 21, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-greenplum-postgres?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Greenplum: Innovation in Data Management for Analytics Enterprise analytics at scale, reimagined for modern deployment strategies. Deep Dive into Greenplum 6 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-greenplum-postgres?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-postgres?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Say Hello to Pivotal Postgres A new way to bring the power and versatility of PostgreSQL to your enterprise. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-postgres?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/how-ceos-can-drive-digital-innovation-without-learning-to-code?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How CEOs Can Drive Digital Innovation Without Learning To Code Ask the right questions, measure the right things, and break down walls. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/how-ceos-can-drive-digital-innovation-without-learning-to-code?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/intersect?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.informationweek.com/strategic-cio/digital-business/theres-no-tech-silver-bullet-for-digital-transformation/a/d-id/1334153]]> There’s No Tech Silver Bullet for Digital Transformation Richard Seroter, VP of Marketing, on the four common traits of executives and organizations that will be successful with digital transformation. It's About The People <[[https://www.informationweek.com/strategic-cio/digital-business/theres-no-tech-silver-bullet-for-digital-transformation/a/d-id/1334153]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/practitioners/the-abcs-of-a-kubernetes-cve?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The ABCs of a Kubernetes CVE Tyler Britten, Senior Principal Technologist, breaks down understanding the runC vulnerability, container users, and PKS day two operations. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/practitioners/the-abcs-of-a-kubernetes-cve?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/steeltoe-2-2-gives-your-net-microservices-a-boost?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Steeltoe 2.2 Is Now GA! Take a spin through the new highlights of this new release. Give Your .NET Microservices a Boost <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/steeltoe-2-2-gives-your-net-microservices-a-boost?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/a-preview-of-cf-summit-2019-with-dormain-drewitz?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> A Preview of Cloud Foundry Summit 2019 Listen to Dormain Drewitz gives a tour of the upcoming conference.
